contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 28, 1914 D South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section)
South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association (B Section) 20 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association south-wales-monmouthshire-brass-band-association-b
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK 5 bands competed.
Oct. 29, 2014, 11:10 p.m. Oct. 2, 2018, 9:55 a.m.
1 Mountain Ash Volunteers W. Greenwood L'Africaine
2 Tonypandy Hibernia G. H. Thomas Poliuto [unknown arranger]
3 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Robert Samuel Howells Reminiscences of Tschaikowsky [arr. Godfrey]
4 Cwmparc James Roberts Nabucco
5 Llanhilleth W. B. Watkin Bohemian Girl
